answers.answer: I did similar things to those things and had things checked. I am waiting on to hear from that from my dr. possible m s for me and other health related issues! I hope things get better for you!

Actually if you can have your blood pressure checked when this happens if possible. I have normally high blood pressure but when I sleep my bp can drop significantly causing numbness and tingling, sometimes unpleasant. Let me know.

question: I toss and turn at night because I can't sleep, the pain in my arms and hands wake me up. I have been going thru this for about a 2-3 weeks now. I went to the doctor he did a diabetes test it came back normal. That's all he had. I'm scared something is really wrong, this isn't normal.
title: Numbness in arms & hands when sleeping!
